description: GCD of n and the reverse of n.
comments: a(A226778(n)) = 1; a(A071249(n)) > 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 18 2013a(n) == n iff n is in A002113. - _Felix Fröhlich_, Oct 28 2014
